definitions.definition: A chart , list , or record of ancestors , to show breeding , especially distinguished breeding.
A person's ancestral history; ancestry , lineage .
The history or provenance of an idea, custom etc.
The ancestry of a domesticated animal, especially a dog or horse .

main_definition: A chart , list , or record of ancestors , to show breeding , especially distinguished breeding. [from 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: A person's ancestral history; ancestry , lineage . [from 15th c.]
( uncountable ) Good breeding or ancestry. [from 15th c.]
The history or provenance of an idea, custom etc. [from 16th c.]
The ancestry of a domesticated animal, especially a dog or horse . [from 17th c.]
